channel.title: Questions i need help with
channel.description:
Im using dodian devolution V7
Here are some questions that ive been trying to figure out for a while, yet no one has helped me.
1.) How do i change the items a player starts with, and the inventory?
2.) How do i make a portal outside yanyill bank, you need a key to enter, once you get key, you enter and it teles you to varrock center?
3.) How do i change the quest menu with my own pages, in other words, how do i edit the quest content in the quest interface?
4.) how do i add Mute, Kick, IpBAN to the right click of a player for admins and mods only?
5.) How do i add the ""follow" option?
6.) Does anyone have the code for the doors and stairs for varrock, or varrock castle?
7.) My monsters dont hit back? how do i fix this?
8.) how do i add objects to certain areas, like a chair out side yanyill bank?
9.) how do i make a menu pop up when people log in?
who ever can answer any of these questions i would greatly apprecate it, also please tell me how to do it in full detail as i am new to this stuff. my msn is zorronux@hotmail.com
Who ever helps will also receive admin status on my server and may get 10$ via paypal. thanks

item.title: Questions i need help with
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

i dont get the send quest method??

and what do you mean by

Use showInterface(int).

can you give me an exmaple

Read full topic

item.title: Questions i need help with
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

2.) How do i make a portal outside yanyill bank, you need a key to enter, once you get key, you enter and it teles you to varrock center?
Edit the packet for using items on objects.
3.) How do i change the quest menu with my own pages, in other words, how do i edit the quest content in the quest interface?
Use the sendQuest(string, int) method.
4.) how do i add Mute, Kick, IpBAN to the right click of a player for admins and mods only?
Edit the packet for clicking options on players.
5.) How do i add the ""follow" option?
Do it yourself.
6.) Does anyone have the code for the doors and stairs for varrock, or varrock castle?
I don't know what the hell you're talking about.
7.) My monsters dont hit back? how do i fix this?
I don't know, the problem is probably in your NPCHandler.
8.) how do i add objects to certain areas, like a chair out side yanyill bank?
Use the addGlobalObject(int, int, int, int, int) method.
9.) how do i make a menu pop up when people log in?
Use showInterface(int).

Read full topic

item.title: Questions i need help with
item.dc:creator: @mackel mackel
item.description:
@mackel wrote:

To change EQ (what player starts with), simply search for:

//Giving the player an unique look

And, you’ll see something like this:

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=4708; playerEquipment[playerCape]=6568; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=4712; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4714; playerEquipment[playerHands]=6922; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6920; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4675;

Now change the item id’s to whatever you want, and if you dont know many item id’s, download my lists at: http://www.rune-server.org/attachment.php?attachmentid=1308&d=1200077779

Or if you want to start with full ahrims and Ancient staff, just use mine

HAPPY CODING!

Read full topic

item.title: Questions i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

Okay, I don’t need any reward, or anything. I will just answer some questions, and some I will pm you with that, since there’s no space.

For question 8, (this is the basics, and another way)
You would search for

// ReplaceObject2(2691, 9774, 2107, 0, 11);

On top of that, you would see some of the objects that was added.

If you want your own, add this

ReplaceObject2(COORDY, COORDX, OBJECTID, -2, 10);
Note: -2 is the face of what the object is facing.

For Question 2, first you search for something like this:

[quote]if ((objectID == 1734) && (objectX == 2724) && (objectY == 9774)) {/quote]

But first of all, you would need to add the OBJECT.

Right after the “break;” you would see something like “}” right?
Click the “}” then type shift+enter.

Once you did that, let’s move on the portal step.

Add this:

if ((objectID == 2469) && (objectX == 3090) && (objectY == 3250)) { // CHANGE THE OBJECTX and OBJECTY to What coord the object is on! resetPos(); if(playerHasItem(####)) { // <<----- CHANGE THE ####TO WHAT ID NUMBER IT IS. teleportToX = ####; // <<--------- THE COORDS IT WILL TELL YOU! teleportToY = ####; // THIS ONE TOO. sendMessage("MESSAGE HERE"); // ONLY IF YOU WANT TO SEND A MESSAGE! break; }

Read full topic
